It's one of the hardcoded texts in your code. Move them all to the **strings.xml** file and refer to them with their ids to make the app easily translatable.

If you want to concatenate strings, check ou tthe [**Formatting and Styling** section of the official guide](https://developer.android.com/guide/topics/resources/string-resource.html#FormattingAndStyling) to see how to do it better.
